p: Extraction procedure defined previously by Canli et al. was used ( Canli et al., 2016) and ground BC samples and active compounds dissolved in extraction solvent (ethanol, Merck, Germany) were seprated by a filtration process (Whatman No. 1). Extraction solvent was then evaporated at 30 °C after attaching the extract to a rotary evaporator (Heidolph). The remaining solution was lyophilized (Christ Alpha 1–2 LD) and residues were used for further analysis.
